Title: WPF Weather Station Project
Description: Weather Station project implemented using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This was a project assigned to us in our GUI class. It is a weather station program done in C#/WPF. It makes full use of the MVVM pattern. The project gives us a directory, called "data", with a list of XML files from which we read in to. We read the data and display it in a graph based on the user's query.

To use, you need to go to File->Open..., choose the directory where all the XML data is stored, and then play around with the application!

Backend Developer: samlh
